Description:
Detects potential PwnKit exploitation CVE-2021-4034 in auth logs

Author: Sreeman
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PwnKit Local Privilege Escalation
Query: sourcetype="linux-auth" (="pkexec" ="The value for environment variable XAUTHORITY contains suspicious content" ="[USER=root] [TTY=/dev/pts/0]")
